story_summary: Alyosha informs Ivan that Smerdyakov has committed suicide by hanging himself and shows him the note left behind. Ivan reveals he has been visited by a devil-like figure who taunts him and claims to know about Smerdyakov's death before anyone else. As Ivan's mental state deteriorates, Alyosha cares for him, staying by his side until he falls into a troubled sleep.
